products.title: UltraSound Wireless Earbuds
products.description: Compact true wireless earbuds with noise cancellation & 30 hr battery life.

products.title: ProFit Fitness Tracker
products.description: Water‑resistant fitness band with heart‑rate monitor and sleep tracking.

products.title: EcoBlend Bamboo Cutting Board Set
products.description: Set of 3 eco‑friendly bamboo boards with juice groove and non‑slip feet.

products.title: ThermaCozy Electric Blanket
products.description: Fleece electric blanket with 10 heat settings and auto shut‑off timer.

products.title: WindCharge USB‑C Power Bank 20,000 mAh
products.description: High‑capacity power bank with dual fast‑charge ports and LED display.

products.title: Artisan Clay Serving Bowl
products.description: Hand‑thrown ceramic bowl, dishwasher safe, 12″ diameter, speckled glaze.

products.title: Lumina LED Desk Lamp
products.description: Adjustable color‑temperature lamp with wireless phone charging pad.

products.title: UrbanTrail Backpack 25 L
products.description: Lightweight daypack with laptop compartment and water‑resistant fabric.

products.title: PureMist Cool‑Mist Humidifier
products.description: Ultrasonic humidifier for rooms up to 500 sq ft, quiet operation, 10‑hr run time.

products.title: SteelChef 10″ Non‑Stick Frying Pan
products.description: Durable kitchen pan with PFOA‑free non‑stick coating and stay‑cool handle.

products.title: Refresh Natural Shampoo Bar – Lavender
products.description: Solid shampoo bar for all hair types, sulfate‑free, vegan & cruelty‑free.

products.title: GamerPro RGB Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: Full‑size mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting and tactile switches.

products.title: AromaHome Reed Diffuser – Ocean Breeze
products.description: Luxury reed diffuser that provides up to 3 months of fresh scent.

products.title: FlexiMat Eco Yoga Mat
products.description: Non‑slip, eco‑friendly TPE yoga mat with alignment lines, 6 mm thickness.

products.title: QuickBrew Portable Espresso Maker
products.description: Compact manual espresso press—no electricity needed, up to 16 bar pressure.

products.title: SkyView 200″ Inflatable Outdoor Movie Screen
products.description: Portable on‑ground screen with tripod and carrying case; suitable for backyard theaters.

products.title: ClearTone Bluetooth Portable Speaker
products.description: Water‑resistant speaker with 12‑hr playback, built‑in mic for calls.

products.title: ClassicWool Men’s Crew Sweater
products.description: 100% merino wool crewneck sweater, regular fit, multiple colors available.

products.description: Set of 12 decorative frames ideal for events, photo booths, or home multiplex displays.

products.description: Double‑wall vacuum insulated bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hrs or hot for 12 hrs.
